formattedAddress: 7 Sherman Ave, New York, NY 10040, USA
adrFormatAddress: 7 Sherman Ave, New York, NY 10040-1801, USA

originalText.text: This place easily deserves each 5 star review and nothing less. First of all Zendaya is awesome and runs such a clean and beautiful establishment.  She is so down to earth and has extensive experience which made me feel at ease for my first time whitening my teeth. My teeth were not badly stained to begin with but I just wanted that extra shine for my birthday this week. I did the 1 hour session; she has comfortable reclining chairs, ports to charge your phone and also plays movies/TVs to watch while you are getting beautified :) By the end of my session my teeth were literally glowing, I was happily surprised by the results! She also sends you an email with explicit instructions on how to care for your new pearly whites. So inspiring to see another Latina thrive and run such an awesome establishment. I've already recommend friends to visit as I've been receiving compliments on my smile :) Loved it!

originalText.text: This is my first review ever on a place and if I could give this place 100 stars I would. I flew in to surprise my mom from Japan and the first stop I knew I had to go was Crazy love studios. I was scared due to getting whitening done at another place and no results. Zeneyda assured me of everything and the process was smooth. I have never had customer service like this before. I loved hearing her stories and her personality and aura was beautiful. Rare to find people like her these days especially when all people want is money and don’t care about the customers. My results were amazing I fell in love with my teeth all over again. Thanks to her I can smile and feel confident. I will definitely be coming back for another round before I leave and every-time I come back from overseas. Seriously the spot to go to if you want to see results and get an amazing experience . I will definitely be recommending this place and sending people over ❤️

originalText.text: I had a unforgettable experience at Crazy Love Studios! The owner is wonderful - absolutely the best business etiquette I have ever experienced. I travel far to get there but it was worth it once I stepped foot into her establishment. She made the experience comforting and as pleasant as possible and most importantly my teeth are white!!!!!!!!!! I will be back with my best friend for her BFF package. I can not stop smiling literally. Please visit Crazy Love Studios - it is worth it. Effective teeth whitening in a welcoming setting. This is my first time ever reviewing a business but I knew I had to share my thoughts! Thank you Z for my pearly whites and your advice see you soon!

originalText.text: This is an amazing place. It is super clean & nice. Customer service is amazing. She is so nice & easy to talk to. She also took me even though I came late & she had other people. I already see my teeth whiter after the first try. I will be back next week for sure. Can't wait until I see the results next week. Keep doing good girl!! I'm so happy for all your success.

originalText.text: Went in today and I’m so happy I did! Zeneyda made me feel super comfortable. My results were better than when my dentist had done the laser whitening. The store is cozy, impeccably clean and there’s parking right across the street! Don’t think twice, make your appointment asap! I can’t wait to go back for my second session!
